species.name: seadra
descriptions: An examination of its cells revealed the presence of a gene not found in HORSEA. It became a hot topic.
Capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.
Its body bristles with sharp spikes. Carelessly trying to touch it could cause fainting from the spikes.
Its fin-tips leak poison. Its fins and bones are highly valued as ingredients in herbal medicine.
Its spines provide protection. Its fins and bones are prized as traditional medicine ingredients.

abilities.name: poison-point
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: sniper
abilities.effect: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.

abilities.name: damp
abilities.effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.
